layer_is_draw_depth_forced.htm+html.head: layer_is_draw_depth_forced.htm+html.body.p:87-3
layer_is_draw_depth_forced: This function can be used to check and see whether forced Z depth is enabled for rendering the layers in the project. See layer_force_draw_depth() for more information.

layer_is_draw_depth_forced.htm+html.head: layer_is_draw_depth_forced.htm+html.body.p:99-3
layer_is_draw_depth_forced: The above code checks to see if the layer Z depth is forced or not and if it is not, it sets the Z depth to 0 and enables it.
